notes: Section 12 contains the standardization pipeline - a critical component of the Fragile Gas framework
Key contribution: Regularized standard deviation function prevents pathological sensitivity near zero variance
Two complementary continuity analyses: mean-square continuity (Section 11.2) and deterministic Lipschitz-Holder continuity (Section 11.3)
The extracted entities do not include sub-lemmas or intermediate proof steps - only major definitions, lemmas, and theorems
Several additional sub-lemmas exist in the source document that provide algebraic decompositions but were not extracted as separate entities
key_mathematical_contributions: Regularized standard deviation function with explicit derivative bounds
Decomposition of standardization error into value error and structural error
Asymptotic scaling analysis showing O(k^{p_worst-case}) behavior
Global Lipschitz-Holder continuity bound with explicit coefficients
Identification of two operational regimes: normal operation (low attrition) and catastrophic collapse
